title: My Plan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Hey, hey, how are you going to spend new years, Chika-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>New years? Let’s see.... Probably staying in my kotatsu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Staying in your kotatsu....? Why?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>“Why?”, you ask! How could you get away if there’s a kotatsu and some mikan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeh, it’s an off day, Rin wants to fly a kite on a park nya. Flying a kite is fun, right? Do it with me, Chika-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Rin-chan.... Flying a kite is fun, but I want you to know the fun kotatsu too.... I’ll show you, you know? Let’s enjoy the allure of kotatsu and mikan, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hmm.... okay nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yaaay! Let’s relax in my kotatsu~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah! Then after we are done relaxing, let’s go fly some kites! You can run much more on a beach than a park, so it’ll be more fun~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Running around on a beach in winter is too cold~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
